search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Castmagic (castmagic.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Castmagic can be found at: [https://www.castmagic.io/pricing](https://www.castmagic.io/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing | Castmagic - 10x your content with AI

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: Castmagic Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/6592b77218147d2fdff010a3_Logo.svg)](https://www.castmagic.io/)

[01 Product](https://www.castmagic.io/features)

[01 Use Cases ![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/6781158a424e52b1cc4123be_arrow_drop_down_24dp_%230D0B08_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24.svg)](https://www.castmagic.io/pricing#)

For Teams

[![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/6781158a424e52b1cc4123c2_image.webp)](https://www.castmagic.io/content-pipeline)

Use cases

[![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/67817bec80902176726ada0f_document.svg) **For Podcasts** Simplify podcast workflows: transcribe, summarize, and repurpose with ease](https://app.castmagic.io/presets/podcast?tab=transcript)[![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/67817c403e9af82c0b4066e0_document.svg) **For Meetings ** Capture and transcribe meeting recordings from Zoom, Google Meet, and more](https://app.castmagic.io/presets/meeting?tab=transcript)[![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/67817c9a5ef3d982a36fabf7_document.svg) **For Sales ** Transform meeting notes into pitches, proposals, and follow-up content in seconds](https://app.castmagic.io/presets/sales-calls?tab=transcript)[![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/67817c20276f2f22d1a82387_document.svg) **For YouTube ** Turn videos into blogs, shorts, and social-ready highlights effortlessly](https://app.castmagic.io/presets/youtube?tab=transcript)[![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/67817c67605f079c9faf9234_document.svg) **For Coaching ** Extend your sessions’ impact with shareable insights, resources, and actionable notes](https://app.castmagic.io/presets/coaching?tab=transcript)[![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/67817ccbd9bfb1aad0d101a2_document.svg) **For Research ** Generate summaries, research briefs, and breakdowns from research recordings](https://app.castmagic.io/presets/customer-discovery?tab=transcript)

[See all Use Cases ![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b9c43cf803b0007440fa38/678116d8afc3cf02736e81b8_chevron_right_24dp_%230D0B08_FILL0_wght400_GRAD0_opsz24.svg)](https://app.castmagic.io/presets)

10M+

Minutes of Content Processed

60+

Languages Supported

Castmagic is for podcast hosts, video streamers, or long form content creators that want to get more mileage out of their content. We make it easy to instantly turn your long form unstructured content into ready-to-use copy for shownotes, highlight clips, summaries, blogs, social posts, newsletters, and more.

Castmagic uses the best in class AI to turn your long form audio directly into the exact content types you need for ready to post creative.

Yes you are entitled to a free trial to play with a few episodes and see how it works in action. If you like what Castmagic can do, we have several plans to choose from.

Castmagic has usage based pricing, meaning that there's a plan for everyone depending on how much transcription and content you work with.

For content needs of 45 mins a week, we recommend our hobby plan. For 2 hours a week worth of content, we'd recommend our starter, and for higher usage needs, try out Rising Star or feel free to get in touch!

Castmagic supports 60+ languages including: English, Dutch, French, German, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian,Japanese, Korean, Mandarin (Simplified), Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian & many more.

Game Changer.
-------------

02

"As our two podcasts have grown to over 35 million downloads, we needed to find a way to streamline some of our process, especially when I came to curating content for our social channels. It’s easy to use and a TIME SAVER!"
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

\- Jake Decker  
Executive Producer, Maxwell Leadership
